DataElement.preferredName: Household Survey Prior Diagnosis Child If Lose Current Income Sources and Live Off Savings, How Long Could Continue to Live at Current Address and Standard of Living Income Duration
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's response of how long they could continue their standard of living if all current incomes sources were to be lost.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Household Survey Prior Diagnosis Child If Lose Current Income Sources and Live Off Savings, How Long Could Continue to Live at Current Address and Standard of Living
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A social unit comprised of one or more individuals living together (all of whom need not be related) in the same dwelling, who aggregate and share their incomes._A document used in a method of data collection that involves interviewing (or giving questionnaires to) a representative and often large group of people._Earlier in time or order._The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation._A person who is not yet an adult. The specific cut-off age will vary by purpose._A question about how long an individual could live at their current address and standard of living if they lost their income source and lived off of savings.

Concepts.longName: If Lose Current Income Sources and Live Off Savings, How Long Could Continue to Live at Current Address and Standard of Living
Concepts.definition: A question about how long an individual could live at their current address and standard of living if they lost their income source and lived off of savings.

ReferenceDocuments.name: If you lost all of your curre
ReferenceDocuments.description: If you lost all of your current sources of income (for example, your paycheck, Social Security or pension, public assistance) and had to live off of your savings, how long could you continue to live at your current address and standard of living?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: If your family lost all of your current sources of income (for example, your paycheck, Social Security or pension, public assistance) and had to live off of your savings, how long could you continue to live at your current address and standard of living?
